name: REDCap Field Encryption Module
description: Encrypts sensitive field values (like email addresses) so they are completely hidden from researchers but accessible to the system for automated invitations and notifications. Supports longitudinal projects and surveys. Use @ENCRYPT action tag on fields to enable encryption.

authors.name: Kshitiz Pokhrel
authors.institution: CERC in Health Equity & Community Well-Being, Toronto Metropolitan University
